name: Whirlwind
longDescription: When this spell is casts the user creates a whirlwind that last for 1d4 rounds the whirlwind travels up to 60 ft in a line with a 25 foot radius. All users who are within the radius must make a DC16 dex check or be caught in the whirlwind for 1d4 rounds taking 1d6 shrapnal damage per round. On a save users are knocked back 10ft.
components: Unknown

name: Cure Wounds
longDescription:
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V, S
Duration: Instantaneous

A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.
components: Unknown

The target takes 4d6 psychic damage and must make an Intelligence saving throw.On a failed save, the creature’s Intelligence and Charisma scores become 1. The creature can’t cast spells, activate magic items,

name: Frost Nova
longDescription: With the flick of your wrist, you discharge a wave of frost magic in all directions. The temperature around you suddenly drops drastically as ice crystals form in mid-air before hurling outward toward your enemies, dealing frost damage and slowing their movements.
components: Verbal, Somatic

name: Silence
longDescription: With this powerful arcane spell, the caster can create a sphere of silence in a specific area. Any sound within this space is instantly muted, making it impossible for those within its radius to hear any noise or even their own voices. Sound can't enter or leave the area, effectively creating a barrier of utter silence. This spell is particularly effective against enemy casters, potentially disrupting their ability to cast spells that require verbal components.
components: V, S

name: Summon Skinflute
longDescription: This spell allows the caster to summon a magical skin flute. Upon a successful performance check with a DC of 13, the caster can command the Skinflute to eject fiery goo, dealing 2d8 acid damage to a target.
components: V, S

name: Celestial Radiance
longDescription: Celestial Radiance calls upon the holy power of the celestial beings to envelop the caster in a luminous aura that heals allies and damages undead foes. The light shines intensely, making it difficult for enemies to approach or attack the caster.
components: V, S, M (a feather from a celestial being)

name: Pyroclasm
longDescription: Pyroclasm causes a violent eruption of flames to burst forth from the ground, engulfing everything in the specified area. The intense heat and flames can cause severe burns and ignite flammable objects.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of sulfur and a red ruby)

name: Flame Strike
longDescription: A vertical column of divine fire roars down from the heavens in a location you specify. Each creature within a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 4d6 fire damage and 4d6 radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
components: V, S, M (pinch of sulfur)

name: Eldritch Blaze
longDescription: A ferocious burst of arcane fire that sears the flesh and soul of its targets. The blaze consumes its victims with otherworldly flames that resist conventional means of suppression.
components: V, S, M (a ruby worth at least 50 gp)

name: Arcane Blast
longDescription: A powerful ray of mystical energy that targets a single enemy, potentially knocking them back and dealing significant arcane damage.
components: V, S

name: Arcane Illumination
longDescription: This spell creates a bright, floating orb of light that follows the caster, illuminating dark areas and revealing hidden dangers. The orb can be controlled to move in a specific direction, providing visibility and advantage in dimly lit environments.
components: V, S

name: Blaze of Zephyr
longDescription: Harnessing the power of swift winds, this spell engulfs the target in fiery gusts that burn and shred simultaneously. The caster conjures a vortex of flame-laden zephyrs, creating a tempest of fire and air that can devastate opponents.
components: V, S, M (a feather dipped in oil)

name: Frostbolt
longDescription: A shard of ice forms in your hand and is hurled at a target. Upon impact, it shatters, sending shards of ice in all directions.
components: V, S

name: Cursed Fireball
longDescription: A fiery sphere of dark energy that not only burns its target but also curses them with lingering ill fortune.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of sulfur)

name: Dragon Flame
longDescription: Conjure a breath of fiery dragon fire to scorch your enemies with an inferno of intense heat.
components: V, S, M (a dragon scale)

name: Dragon Flame Orb
longDescription: The caster conjures an orb of searing dragon fire, which can be thrown at a target to inflict tremendous fire damage. The orb explodes upon impact, engulfing the target and nearby creatures in a burst of flame.
components: V, S, M (a dragon scale)

name: Fireball
longDescription: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 6d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)

name: Frostfire Orb
longDescription: A potent spell that conjures a swirling sphere of burning ice, combining the elements of fire and frost to devastating effect. When cast, the orb explodes upon impact, unleashing both freezing and scorching energies.
components: V, S, M (a shard of obsidian and a sliver of ice)

name: Inferno Orb
longDescription: A swirling sphere of intense fire, the Inferno Orb burns everything in its path. The orb can be hurled at enemies, causing a devastating explosion upon impact.
components: V, S

name: Mystic Insight
longDescription: This spell grants the caster enhanced perception and awareness, allowing them to see through illusions and sense hidden truths.
components: V, S, M (a piece of clear crystal)

name: Mindfire Burst
longDescription: Unleashes a tumultuous burst of mental energy, overwhelming the minds of those in the area with chaotic and fiery thoughts. Creatures affected by this spell find it difficult to maintain focus and may suffer from intense headaches and confusion.
components: V, S, M (a shard of obsidian)

name: Arcane Blast
longDescription: Unleashes a concentrated blast of arcane energy that damages and potentially stuns a target.
components: V, S

name: Burning Spasm
longDescription: Burning Spasm imbues a targeted creature with unbearable heat, causing their muscles to painfully contract involuntarily. The target suffers both physical pain and fire damage over a duration of several minutes.
components: V, S (a small piece of charcoal)

name: Ensnaring Strike
longDescription:
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Self
Components: V
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

The next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack before this spell ends, a writhing mass of thorny vines appears at the point of impact, and the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained by the magical vines until the spell ends. A Large or larger creature has advantage on this saving throw. If the target succeeds on the save, the vines shrivel away.

While restrained by this spell, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature restrained by the vines or one that can touch the creature can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC. On a success, the target is freed.

At Higher Levels. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.
components: Unknown

name: Mysterious Storm
longDescription: A mysterious storm enshrouds a 150ft area in a tumultuous tempest, threatening enemies within. Those within the storm must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 8d6 lightning damage. Any foes struck by the lightning are inflicted with disadvantage on attack rolls.
components: V, S, M (a shard of obsidian and a drop of water)

name: Ultimate Earworm
longDescription: This 7th level bard spell creates the ultimate earworm, a song you can never forget. You might try to shake shake shake it off but you just can't!
components: V, S, M (a small musical instrument)

name: Arcane Burst
longDescription: A volatile surge of pure magical energy that streaks towards a target, dealing substantial force damage on impact.
components: V, S

name: Flaming Sphere
longDescription: This flaming sphere deals 2d8 damage per round to enemies within 5 feet.
components: V, S, M (a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron)

name: Blend
longDescription: Instead of invisibility the caster becomes cryptically colored, similar to a chameleon, blending into their environment and obfuscating their essence both physical and magical.
components: V, S, M (a chameleon's scale)

name: Webs
longDescription: The caster conjures a thick web from thin air, designed to ensnare and immobilize their enemies. The sticky threads are resilient to simple attempts to break free, forcing the entrapped to either cut their way out or use powerful magic to escape.
components: V, S, M (a bit of spider web)

name: Grim Harvest
longDescription: At 2nd level, you gain the ability to reap life energy from creatures you kill with your spells. Once per turn when you kill one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, you regain hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times its level if the spell belongs to the School of Necromancy. You don't gain this benefit for killing constructs or undead.
components: Unknown

name: Ray of Miasma
longDescription: A sickly green ray shoots from your fingertip, enveloping the target in a noxious haze that saps vitality and spreads disease.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of sulfur)

name: Summon Undead
longDescription: This sinister spell allows the caster to call forth undead creatures from beyond the grave to fight at their command. The summoned undead obey the caster's commands without hesitation, making this spell an invaluable tool for necromancers and dark wizards.
components: V, S, M (a black onyx worth at least 25 sp per creature)

name: Colossal Disruption
longDescription: This spell channels immense magical energy to create a massive, devastating explosion, impacting a vast area and causing significant destruction.
components: V, S, M (a piece of obsidian and sulfur)

name: Summon Colonial Maid
longDescription: Dave summons a colonial maid to assist with tasks.
components: V, S

name: Melf's Acid Arrow
longDescription: A shimmering green arrow streaks towards a target creature. On a hit, the target takes immediate acid damage and additional damage at the end of their next turn.
components: V, S, M (powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach)

name: Flaming Plasma Sphere
longDescription: A sphere of intense, fiery plasma bursts into existence, scorching all enemies within its reach. The sphere can be directed by the caster, leaving a trail of searing heat in its wake.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of sulfur and a bit of magnesium)

name: Healing Word
longDescription: A brief utterance of divine power that mends wounds and restores vitality.
components: V (Verbal)

name: Flames of Efropa
longDescription: Conjures a blazing inferno that engulfs enemies in a targeted area, dealing intense fire damage and potentially spreading to adjacent foes.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of sulfur)

name: Mystic Flame
longDescription: A dazzling burst of magical flame that engulfs a target, potentially igniting everything in its vicinity.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of sulfur)

name: Mystic Fireball
longDescription: Mystic Fireball conjures a sphere of intense, blue flames that explode upon impact, consuming everything in a 20-foot radius in magical fire. The flames are said to be drawn from the Elemental Plane of Fire and can incinerate most materials almost instantly.
components: V, S, M (a ball of bat guano and sulfur)

name: Mystic Barrier
longDescription: An invisible shield forms around the caster, deflecting incoming attacks and absorbing magical damage.
components: V, S

name: Arcane Shield
longDescription: Arcane Shield conjures a magical barrier that protects the caster from incoming attacks and spells, absorbing damage and reflecting a portion back to the attacker.
components: V, S, M (a small crystal or gemstone)

name: Capital Expenditure
longDescription: A spell that channels monetary energy to either empower allies or weaken enemies through financial manipulation. Makes your life so much easier
components: V, S, M (a gold coin)

name: Eldritch Blast
longDescription: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a target within range, dealing force damage upon impact.
components: V, S

name: Celestial Blaze
longDescription: A radiant column of fire descends from the heavens, engulfing enemies in divine flames that burn away evil and heal allies within its area of effect.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of holy incense)

name: Spell Share abc Tester
longDescription: A wizard testing a fire spell a
components: V, S, M (a small piece of coal)

name: Kamalamelon Sting
longDescription: Similar to the mega man X move, Chameleon Sting fires out 3 projectiles in a spread pattern dealing 2d8 poison damage.
components: V, S

name: Healing Word
longDescription: A brief magical utterance that restores health to a creature you can see within range.
components: Verbal

name: Alarm
longDescription: You set an alarm against unwanted intrusion. Choose a door, a window, or an area within range that is no larger than a 20-foot cube. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you whenever a Tiny or larger creature touches or enters the warded area.
components: V, S, M (a tiny bell and a piece of fine silver wire)

name: Searing Smite
longDescription: Your weapon flares with white-hot intensity, and the next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during the spell's duration, the attack deals an extra 1d6 fire damage to the target and causes them to ignite in flames. At the start of each of its turns until the spell ends, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 1d6 fire damage. On a successful save, the spell ends.
components: V

name: Jump
longDescription: This spell enhances the subject's physical capability to leap extraordinary distances, increasing their jump height and distance dramatically.
components: V, S, M (a grasshopper's hind leg)

name: Healing Word
longDescription: A soft-spoken incantation that heals wounds and restores vigor to the injured. This spell is known for its quick efficacy in dire situations.
components: V (Verbal)

name: Pineapple Breeze
longDescription: A refreshing gust of tropical air infused with the essence of pineapples, granting those it passes a sense of rejuvenation and improved clarity. The spell carries a sweet, invigorating aroma that can bolster the morale of allies in its path.
components: V, S, M (a slice of dried pineapple)

name: Shroud of Myst
longDescription: Envelops the caster in a mystical fog, granting concealment and mystical insights while within the shroud.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of cloud)

name: Rain Privilege
longDescription: Rain Privilege showers blessings upon the land, as a gentle rain that nourishes crops and purifies the earth. This spell fosters growth and rejuvenation in areas that have been parched by drought or neglect.
components: V, S, M (a handful of rainwater)

name: Firebolt
longDescription: A bolt of fire hurtles from your fingertips, igniting flammable objects not being worn or carried. The searing flames scorch all within its path, leaving a faint trail of embers in the air.
components: V, S

name: Mystic Flames
longDescription: Mystic Flames conjures a swirling vortex of supernatural fire, engulfing targets in an intense blaze that burns with an eerie, otherworldly light.
components: V, S

name: Heart of Darkness
longDescription: This spell inflicts the target with a magical heart attack. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed and take 2d8 necrotic damage per turn.
components: V, S, M (a blackened heart of a small creature)

name: Summon Cheesecake
longDescription: A delectable spell that brings forth a perfectly baked cheesecake, complete with a rich, smooth filling and a crumbly crust. Often used to entice allies, celebrate victories, or simply satisfy a sweet tooth.
components: V, S, M (a small crumble of shortbread)

name: Summon Water
longDescription: The caster conjures a massive surge of water from thin air, summoning up to 500 gallons of crystal-clear liquid onto a designated area or container. This spell is particularly useful for extinguishing fires, creating a temporary moat, or providing emergency water in dry locales.
components: V, S, M (a small vial of water)

name: Velvet Daze
longDescription: Velvet Daze is a mesmerizing enchantment that surrounds the target in a soothing, shimmering aura that calms their senses and clouds their perception. This spell is particularly effective in pacifying hostile creatures or diverting their attention momentarily.
components: V, S

name: Bottomless Pour
longDescription: A spell that conjures an endless stream of liquid from a container, never spilling over and always providing just the right amount desired by the caster.
components: V, S, M (a small vial of water)

name: Goblet of Firewater
longDescription: The Goblet of Firewater engulfs its wielder in a protective arcane flame. While maintaining its warmth, this spell provides a shield against the coldest of environments and burns anything that dares to approach too closely.
components: V, S, M (a small ceramic cup and a drop of oil)

name: Shadowbomb
longDescription: With a flick of your wrist, you conjure a swirling orb of darkness that pulsates with a sinister energy. When you release it, the orb hurls forward, exploding upon impact in a burst of shadowy tendrils that grasp at the very essence of your foes. Those caught in the explosion feel their strength wane as the chilling shadows attempt to strip away their vitality, leaving them weakened and disoriented
components: V, S, M (a piece of coal and a drop of ink)

name: Shadowfang
longDescription: You conjure a swirling orb of darkness that pulsates with shadowy energy. With a flick of your wrist, the sphere is hurled toward your target, exploding on impact and engulfing the area in an inky blackness that obscures vision and drains the vitality of those caught within.
components: V, S, M (a small black gemstone worth at least 10 gp)

name: Frostshock
longDescription: You conjure a chilling wave of frost that surges forth from your outstretched hand, encasing your enemies in a glacial embrace. As the icy aura engulfs them, it leaves a numbing sensation that disrupts their movements and saps their resolve.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of ice)

name: Quick Attack
longDescription: In a flash of speed, you summon a flicker of energy that empowers your next strike. As you swing your weapon, an ethereal afterimage follows your motion, creating the illusion of a second attack that confounds your enemy and can potentially land a hit before they react.
components: V, S

name: Staff of Elemental Wrath
longDescription: With a flourish of your magical staff, you channel the raw elements, unleashing a devastating surge of elemental energy. The staff thrums with power as it coalesces the forces of fire, ice, and lightning into a cyclone of chaos, striking your foes and leaving them reeling from the unleashed elemental fury.
components: V, S, M (a small crystal shard)

name: Inferno's Grasp
longDescription: You conjure the essence of a blazing firestorm, engulfing your enemies in searing flames. With a fervent incantation and an elegant gesture, you summon a vortex of fire that erupts from your fingertips, striking foes within your gaze. The flames dance and twist, eagerly seeking out the warmth of living beings as they descend into chaos, leaving nothing but ash in their wake.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of sulfur)

name: Aegis Shield
longDescription: You raise your hands and invoke a shimmering barrier of arcane energy that envelops you or an ally, providing protection against incoming attacks. This shield crackles with blue light, absorbing a portion of the damage dealt to its target, and can be seen flickering within the air, deflecting harmful spells and projectiles alike.
components: V, S, M (a small silver mirror worth at least 10 GP)

name: Veil of Aegis
longDescription: You envelop yourself in a shimmering barrier that deflects harm and shields against curses. As you chant the incantation, a translucent aura surrounds you, flickering with a golden hue. The barrier hums with protective energy, absorbing harmful spells directed at you while bolstering your will against dark influences.
components: V

name: Aegis of the Arcane Shield
longDescription: You call upon ancient protective energies, enveloping yourself or an ally in a shimmering barrier that absorbs incoming harm. This protective arcane shield glows brightly, shifting colors based on the type of damage it absorbs, creating an ethereal aura that wards against further attacks for a brief moment.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of crystal worth at least 10 gold pieces)

name: Guardian's Aegis
longDescription: You weave a protective barrier of shimmering light around a creature of your choice, providing them with a mystical shield that absorbs incoming damage. As the barrier is invoked, ethereal runes appear around the target, glowing with an aura that wards off malevolent forces.
components: V, S, M (a piece of crystalline quartz)

name: Death Touch
longDescription: You reach out with a skeletal finger, channeling dark energy that chills the very life force of your target. As your finger makes contact, a wave of necrotic energy crawls through their body, draining vitality and leaving behind a sense of overwhelming dread. Should the target fail to resist, the culmination of all their life essence is threatened, leaving a chilling mark of your cursed influence.
components: V, S

name: Blazing Ward
longDescription: You conjure a fiery barrier that protects you and your allies from harm while simultaneously scorching any foes that dare approach. The intense heat radiates outward, deterring enemies and punishing those who get too close.
components: V

name: Eldritch Blast - 1d10 force
longDescription: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes force damage.
components: V, S

name: Pussy Sniff - detect felines
longDescription: With a subtle incantation, you enhance your olfactory senses to detect the presence of feline creatures within the area. This spell allows you to pinpoint the location of cats, big or small, by following their unique scent trail.
components: V, S

name: Gaseous Gust
longDescription: You invoke a spell that causes a sudden release of noxious gas from a designated target, creating a disruptive and disorienting effect. The gas is potent enough to cause those nearby to recoil in disgust and discomfort.
components: V, S, M (a small vial of vinegar)

name: Summon Arch-Devil
longDescription: With a sinister chant that resonates with dark energies, you summon an arch-devil from the depths of the Nine Hells. As a smoky portal tears open before you, a towering figure emerges, surrounded by flickering hellfire and an aura of malevolence. This arch-devil, bound to your will, fights alongside you for the duration of the spell or until it is dismissed. Be warned, however: the presence of such dark power stirs a malevolent influence in the hearts of those nearby.
components: V, S, M (a drop of your blood and a small piece of obsidian)

name: Giants Fist
longDescription: You channel the raw power of earth and stone, conjuring a massive, spectral hand that slams down upon your foes with earth-shaking force. As you cast this spell, the ground trembles and the air fills with the sound of grinding stone. With a swift motion, the Giant’s Fist emerges, targeting a creature of your choice within range. Upon impact, the fist brings down the fury of the mountains, delivering devastating force.
components: V, S, M (a piece of stone from a giant’s lair)

name: Butt Stank
longDescription: You conjure a foul, noxious cloud that emanates from your target, causing all nearby creatures to recoil in disgust. The stench is so potent that it can disorient and nauseate those caught within its area of effect.
components: V, S, M (a piece of rotten food)

name: Booty Stank
longDescription: You unleash a wave of foul odor that fills the air, causing your enemies to recoil in disgust. A noxious cloud swirls around you, emanating from your very presence, disrupting your foes’ focus and causing both confusion and nausea. Creatures caught in the stench are overwhelmed with the urge to retreat from the horrific smell.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of moldy cheese)

name: Foul Gust
longDescription: With a mischievous grin, you summon a wave of noxious wind that erupts from your body, carrying with it a stench that can turn even the bravest of warriors pale. The air ripples as the odorous cloud expands, enveloping all nearby in a cloud of embarrassment and discomfort. All creatures within the radius must contend with the violation of their senses.
components: V, S

name: Force Touch
longDescription: A violent touch, not asked for! The caster channels raw force energy into a devastating touch, dealing 2d10 force damage to the target. Additionally, the target must succeed on a Will saving throw (DC 17) or be afflicted with 'the ick,' a debilitating condition that causes disorientation and nausea.
components: V, S

name: Frostfire Blast
longDescription: You unleash a swirling bolt of icy fire that explodes upon impact, sending out a wave of freezing flames that both burn and freeze those caught in its path.
components: V, S, M (a piece of ice and a pinch of sulfur)

name: Blastoise Spray
longDescription: You channel the power of the mythical Blastoise, summoning a torrential spray of water that blasts forth from your outstretched hands. The forceful stream can knock foes off their feet and push them away with its sheer power.
components: V, S

name: Pika Pika
longDescription: With a swift incantation, you channel the essence of a thunderbolt into your fingertips. As you release the spell, a dazzling bolt of electricity arcs toward your target, crackling with the sound of a thousand chirping Pikapikas. The energy not only strikes the primary target but also dances unpredictably to nearby foes, creating a spectacle of light and sound.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of amber or a glass rod)

name: Celestial Cadillac Catastrophe
longDescription: You summon a vintage Cadillac from the celestial realm, which plummets from the sky with divine force. Upon impact, it explodes in a spectacular display of otherworldly energy, dealing massive damage to all within its explosive radius.
components: V, S, M (a miniature car model worth at least 100 gp)

name: Smackaho
longDescription: With a swift gesture and a sharp word, you unleash a concentrated blast of force that propels a target backward with a resounding smack, often leaving them disoriented.
components: V, S

name: Noxious Cocoa Pebble Puff
longDescription: You crush a tiny cocoa pebble, releasing a deadly cloud of poisonous gas that spreads out to envelop your enemies. The gas carries the faint scent of chocolate, masking its lethal nature until it's too late.
components: V, S, M (a cocoa pebble)

name: Cheese Sniff
longDescription: By invoking this spell, the caster gains the ability to detect the scent of cheese within a 3-mile radius, guiding them unerringly towards the nearest source of cheese. The aroma becomes stronger as the caster approaches the cheese, making it easier to locate.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of cheese)

name: Feline's Wrathful Hiss
longDescription: With a fierce hiss, you channel the primal essence of felines to unleash a disorienting wave of sound that can unsettle the minds of your foes, causing them to become disoriented and fearful.
components: V, S

name: Violet Flame Burst
longDescription: You conjure a swirling burst of violet flames that erupt from your outstretched hand, engulfing your foes in an intense, mystical fire. The flames do not burn conventionally but instead sap the vitality of those they touch, leaving them weakened and disoriented.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of ash from a burnt violet)

name: Conjure a Beautiful Welcome Tray
longDescription: With a graceful wave of your hand, you summon an elegant tray adorned with intricate designs. Upon it sits a steaming kettle of aromatic tea and a plate piled high with freshly baked biscuits, inviting all who see it to partake in the warmth and comfort it offers.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of tea leaves and a crumb of biscuit)

name: Eternal Night's Embrace
longDescription: By invoking the deepest shadows, you envelop the land in an unnatural darkness that lasts for an entire year. This spell creates a perpetual night, blotting out the sun and stars, causing the environment to become cold and inhospitable. The darkness is so dense that even magical light struggles to penetrate it.
components: V, S, M (a vial of midnight oil and a piece of obsidian worth at least 1,000 gp)

name: A Gentle Breeze
longDescription: You conjure a soothing and refreshing breeze that wafts gently around you, providing comfort and a mild cooling effect. This breeze can alleviate minor discomforts from heat and improve the air quality in a small area, making it more pleasant to breathe.
components: V, S

name: Subtle Mist
longDescription: Upon casting this spell, a fine, almost imperceptible mist envelops the caster, creating a humid environment with over 60% humidity that lasts for 6 months. This mist subtly alters the environment around the caster, making it difficult for others to notice their presence, and can affect nearby objects and creatures with its dampness.
components: V, S, M (a vial of water and a pinch of dust)

name: Chicken Storm
longDescription: You call forth a tempestuous storm of ethereal chickens that swarm your enemies, pecking and fluttering chaotically. The affected area becomes filled with squawks and feathers, disorienting and damaging those within.
components: V, S, M (a feather)

name: Infernal Charge
longDescription: You summon a ferocious beast wreathed in flames that charges forward, slamming into your enemies with explosive force, potentially knocking them off their feet.
components: V, S, M (a piece of coal)

name: Galaxy in a Bottle
longDescription: You encapsulate the essence of a distant galaxy within a small glass bottle. When thrown, the bottle shatters, releasing a cataclysmic explosion that teleports all within its area of effect to a newly created galaxy, far removed from their current location.
components: V, S, M (a small glass bottle filled with stardust worth at least 1,000 gp)

name: Luminous Veil
longDescription: You weave a delicate tapestry of shimmering light around yourself or an ally, creating a protective barrier that glows with a soft radiance. This veil not only obscures the wearer from sight but also reflects a portion of incoming attacks, creating an ethereal shield that absorbs damage.
components: V, S, M (a small mirror)

name: Frostfire Grasp
longDescription: You envelop your hands in a swirling ethereal mist that radiates both cold and burning heat. When you strike, your icy fist slams into your target, leaving a chilling fire that sears their very essence. The lingering frost causes a stinging sensation, slowing your enemies, while the flames singe their flesh.
components: V, S, M (a drop of molten lava and a pinch of snow)

name: Veil of Shadows
longDescription: You weave a shroud of darkness around yourself, allowing you to blend into the shadows and obscure your presence. As you cast the spell, the air thickens and darkens, wrapping you in an ethereal cloak that muffles sound and dulls the senses of those around you. For the duration of the spell, you become harder to detect, slipping past your foes unnoticed or providing the perfect opportunity for a sneak attack.
components: V, S

name: Veil of Shadows
longDescription: With a flick of your wrist, you weave a cloak of darkness that envelops you and your allies. This supernatural shroud dampens the light around you and muffles sound, granting you an uncanny ability to hide from all but the keenest of senses. As you move, shadows ripple and swirl around you in a mesmerizing dance, making it difficult for your foes to focus on your presence.
components: V, S, M (a piece of black cloth)

name: Necrotic Touch
longDescription: You channel dark energy through your fingertips, extending your hand toward a creature. The sickly aura of death wraps around it as your hand makes contact, draining its life force and leaving behind a lingering sensation of decay. The target feels the icy grip of mortality as their vitality is siphoned away.
components: V, S, M (a black candle and a drop of blood)

name: Charming Gas
longDescription: You unleash a shimmering cloud of enchanting gas that envelops the area around you, filling the air with a sweet, intoxicating aroma. Creatures that inhale the gas find themselves feeling unusually friendly, their defenses lowered as they become momentarily captivated by the alluring haze. The gas lingers for a short duration, allowing those influenced by it to see you as a close ally, while hostile intentions flicker away like candlelight.
components: V, S, M (a handful of sweet herbs worth at least 1 gold piece)

name: Alchemical Fire
longDescription: You conjure a swirling vial of alchemical fire that ignites upon impact. As the vial shatters, tendrils of flame swirl outwards, igniting any combustible materials and sending a critter of fiery energy cascading in all directions. The scent of sulfur and brimstone fills the air as the flames dance chaotically, consuming anything they touch.
components: V, S, M (a drop of oil and a bit of powdered sulfur)

name: Fumes of Charming
longDescription: As you invoke this spell, you exhale a thick cloud of shimmering, colorful mist that swirls through the air. The captivating aromas permeate the area, enchanting those who inhale it with feelings of warmth and goodwill. All creatures within the cloud are enveloped in delightful sensations, making them more susceptible to your suggestions and influences. Those affected may find themselves drawn to your words and compelled to assist you in your endeavors, at least for a brief moment.
components: V, S, M (a sprig of lavender and a drop of honey)

name: Depths of the Void
longDescription: Calling upon the emptiness of the cosmos, you extend your hand and conjure a swirling mass of dark energy. This abyssal force wrenches at the very fabric of reality, pulling in nearby creatures and trapping them in a state of helplessness. Shadows flicker and twist around you as you channel the energy, creating a void that disrupts light and sound, leaving your enemies disoriented and vulnerable.
components: V, S, M (a piece of black cloth and a small mirror)

name: Turtle Crossing
longDescription: With a flick of your wrist, you summon a mystical turtle that appears directly in the path of your enemies, causing them to stumble and become disoriented as they attempt to navigate around it.
components: V, S, M (a small turtle shell)

name: Fermented Spunk
longDescription: Upon casting this vile spell, the caster's corpse becomes a grotesque vessel from which a noxious fluid, known as fermented spunk, begins to ooze and drip onto the floor. This fluid spawns hostile creatures that emerge from the pooling liquid, ready to attack the caster's enemies.
components: V, S, M (a piece of rotten flesh)

name: Necrotic Putrefaction
longDescription: You channel the dark energies of necromancy to corrupt the target's lower intestines, causing vile black blood to pool in their thighs and groin. The afflicted creature suffers intense sickness and debilitating pain as the necrotic energy spreads.
components: V, S, M (a piece of rotten flesh)

name: Gungan Blast
longDescription: You channel the chaotic energy of the Gungan swamps, unleashing a volatile blast that disrupts and damages your foes. The energy forms into a swirling mass that expands outward, affecting all in its path with a mix of force and elemental power.
components: V, S, M (a piece of swamp moss)

name: Celestial Feline and Canine Deluge
longDescription: You call upon the heavens to unleash a magical storm of 30 ethereal cats followed by an explosive barrage of 30 spectral dogs. The cats descend gracefully, causing disarray, while the dogs burst upon impact, creating a devastating explosion.
components: V, S, M (a piece of cat fur and a dog's tooth)

name: Firestorm
longDescription: You unleash a swirling vortex of fire that consumes all in its path. The flames leap and dance, scorching the earth and incinerating those caught within. The storm lasts for a brief moment, leaving behind a trail of ash and smoldering embers.
components: V, S, M (A ruby worth at least 500 gp, which the spell consumes)

name: Summon Corn
longDescription: You invoke the elemental essence of agriculture, causing a golden harvest of corn to sprout in a designated area. The corn grows rapidly from the soil, creating a magical field of dense stalks that can grow as high as 8 feet. This field is not only a boon for sustenance but can also provide cover and concealment for those within it. The corn can be harvested for food, or its magical properties can be harnessed to create corn-based spells or items.
components: V, S, M (a single corn kernel)

name: Firebomb
longDescription: You conjure a volatile sphere of fire and hurl it towards the designated area. Upon impact, it explodes in a burst of intense heat, igniting flammable materials and searing flesh. The initial blast is followed by lingering flames that continue to burn those caught in the area.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of sulfur)
duration: Instantaneous (initial blast), then 1 minute of lingering flames

name: Frostsplash
longDescription: With a flick of your wrist, you conjure a small, icy shard that explodes on impact, showering the target area with freezing mist. The mist clings to surfaces and chills those caught within, hindering their movements and sapping their warmth.
components: V, S, M (A drop of water)

name: Fireball
longDescription: You unleash a roaring ball of fire that streaks towards a point within range and erupts in a colossal explosion, engulfing the area in searing flames. The intense heat causes secondary fires that can spread to flammable objects in the vicinity.
components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)

name: Galactic Breath
longDescription: You exhale a stream of ethereal air, causing those nearby to become lightheaded. Affected creatures may experience a disorienting phase shift, blinking in and out of this universe.
components: V, S

name: Giant Bee's Wrath
longDescription: You summon a spectral giant bee that targets a creature within range, delivering a venomous sting that inflicts poison damage. The bee vanishes after its attack.
components: V, S, M (a bee's stinger)

name: Hackstorm
longDescription: With a swift incantation, you unleash a swirling vortex of arcane energy that hacks into the very essence of reality, disrupting the flow of magic around your targets and causing chaotic effects.
components: V, S, M (a piece of shattered mirror)

name: Ad Read
longDescription: By invoking this spell, the caster channels the power of commerce, generating a burst of ethereal energy that materializes into a sum of 10,000 gold pieces. The spell draws upon the ambient energies of the marketplace, converting them into tangible wealth.
components: V, S, M (a coin from any realm)

name: Frostweave Shroud
longDescription: You weave a chilling mist around a target, encasing it in a layer of frost that slows its movements and deals cold damage over time. The frost creates a shimmering, icy aura that can be seen in dim light.
components: V, S, M (a piece of ice or a vial of water)

name: Cadillac Rain
longDescription: You call forth a destructive rain of 300 classic Cadillacs, pimp mobiles, that fall from the sky. Each vehicle explodes upon impact, dealing devastating damage within a 15-foot radius. Those caught within the area must make a Reflex saving throw to avoid the full brunt of the explosive force.
components: V, S, M (a miniature car model worth at least 100 gp)

name: Echoes of the Past
longDescription: You cast this spell to glimpse into the history of a location or object. Upon casting, you can see and hear brief, flickering images and sounds from significant events that transpired in the area or with the object, providing you with insights into its past.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of amber or crystal)

name: Supper Time
longDescription: With a wave of your hand and a whispered incantation, you conjure a sumptuous feast from thin air, tailored to the tastes and dietary needs of those present. The meal appears on a conjured table, complete with seating and utensils, fostering camaraderie and refreshment among allies.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of salt and a drop of water)

name: Polymorphic Shift
longDescription: With a wave of your hands and a few whispered words of power, you manipulate the very essence of a creature, reshaping it into a form of your choosing. The target undergoes an enchanting transformation, changing into a creature that can be of your choice, provided it shares a similar size. The air shimmers as they transform, their features meld and shift, granting them new abilities and traits befitting their new form. This is a wondrous experience; however, they retain their intelligence, memories, and personality, allowing for a unique role in battle or exploration.
components: V, S, M (a spider's leg and a bit of animal fur)

name: Legions of the Fallen
longDescription: Unleashing a swirling vortex of dark energy, you call forth an army of long-forgotten souls and decaying corpses from the grave to serve as your guardians. Shadows and echoes of the past coalesce into a formidable legion, rising in response to your command. These spectral entities stand ready to defend you against any foes that dare to approach, their eerie whispers filling the air with a haunting melody. As your foes confront the undying horde, the very essence of fear and despair seeps into their hearts.
components: V, S, M (a black onyx worth at least 500 gp)

name: Veil of Invisibility
longDescription: You conjure a shimmering, translucent bubble that envelops you, creating a protective sphere that renders you effectively invisible to all creatures and entities outside of its bounds. The bubble refracts light and sound, causing those outside to unknowingly avoid your presence. For the duration of the spell, the bubble acts as a barrier, blocking all sound and sight of you, while you remain aware of what occurs outside through the veil’s subtle vibrations.
components: M

name: Arcane Escape
longDescription: As your life hangs by a thread, you invoke an ancient enchantment that whirls you away from danger. You harness the last flickers of your strength, calling upon mystical energies to teleport you instantly to a sanctuary of safety, preserving your life when the odds are utterly against you.
components: V, S, M (a drop of your own blood)

name: Artifact's Whisper
longDescription: You channel your arcane energy and the echoes of history resonate through time. As you focus your mind, a shimmering projection begins to form, revealing the path to a lost artifact. Threads of fate entwine around your fingertips, guiding you towards its hidden location, even across vast distances. A faint, melodic hum fills the air, and you can almost hear the artifact's story beckoning you to uncover it.
components: V, S, M (a fragment of the artifact you seek or a gemstone worth at least 1,000 gold)

name: Inversion Ruin
longDescription: As you weave a series of intricate gestures and chant ancient incantations, the very fabric of reality twists around your enemies. A horrifying energy radiates from your fingertips, engulfing foes within a 15-foot radius. Those affected feel their insides churn violently as the spell forces their bodies to invert, leaving them in a state of excruciating agony. The brutal transformation results in their immediate demise, with only silhouettes of their former selves remaining. However, those of pure heart and noble intent — such as elves, priests, and other guardians of virtue — will find themselves shielded from the spell's wrath, untouched by its malevolence.
components: V, S, M (a piece of ice and a drop of your own blood)

name: Charmed Conclave
longDescription: Upon invoking the Charmed Conclave, you weave an enchanting aura that captivates and influences the weak-willed around you. With a flick of your wrist, you make your presence known, and impressionable creatures within range fall under your influence. They become entranced by your charm, drawn to you like moths to a flame. These allies will defend you fiercely, employing cunning distractions to seduce your enemies into vulnerable states or ruthlessly attacking anyone who threatens you. The spell creates a swirling display of colors and sounds that enthrall those within its reach, setting the stage for an impromptu protective entourage.
components: V, S, M (a small mirror and a crystal vial of honey)

name: Nutrify
longDescription: You channel your magical energy to transform the refuse and detritus of the world into sustenance. As you gather the waste around you—discarded scraps, excrement, or even severed body parts—you weave intricate sigils in the air with your hands. With a flourish, the refuse glows and is consumed by a radiant light, morphing into hearty and nutritious meals. For a moment, the smell of rot and decay is replaced by the aroma of freshly baked bread and roasted meats, filling the air with a welcoming scent of abundance.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of food that has not spoiled)

name: The Brown Sound
longDescription: You unleash a low-frequency resonance that echoes unnaturally through the air, filling the minds of your foes with an uncontrollable wave of nausea. The humming buzz courses through the area, causing visceral reactions among enemies, leaving them vulnerable and incapacitated as they lose control of their bodily functions for the duration of the spell.
components: V, S

name: Rain of Cats & Dogs
longDescription: You call forth a chaotic storm that breaks the clouds above, showering your enemies with a wild storm of both cats and dogs. As they fall, they land with a thud, immediately taking on a feral nature, springing into action to swarm and attack your foes. These animals, fueled by an unseen magical force, coordinate their efforts, launching a barrage of scratches, bites, and chaotic antics against all creatures in your vicinity.
components: V, S, M (a ball of yarn and a small dog whistle)

name: Throaty Roar
longDescription: You unleash a formidable bellow that echoes through the battlefield, resonating with primal power. Your roar is infused with raw magical energy, instilling terror in the hearts of your foes and bolstering your allies. As the sound reverberates, it creates an aura of dread that hampers enemies' resolve while invigorating your comrades with courage.
components: V, S

name: Turtle Power
longDescription: Drawing upon the ancient wisdom and enduring strength of turtle ancestors, you channel their primal resilience into your very being. Your skin takes on a subtle shell-like texture, your movements become more deliberate but powerful, and an aura of ancient determination surrounds you. The spirits of great turtle ancestors whisper guidance, granting you their legendary fortitude and steady might.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of turtle shell)

name: Summon Lightning McQueen
longDescription: As you call upon the magic of the racing spirits, a roaring car materializes from a swirl of electric blue and yellow lightning. This summoned vehicle, resembling a racing champion, zooms forth, ready to carry you or perform feats of speed and agility. Its engine revs with an enchanting hum, providing not only rapid transportation but also a strategic advantage in the chaos of battle. With its gleaming tires and motley lightning accents, Lightning McQueen represents the pinnacle of speed and magic combined. Once summoned, Lightning McQueen obeys your commands, darting across the battlefield or racing through the lands, serving you in your quests.
components: V, S

name: Gavel Strike
longDescription: You conjure a massive, ethereal gavel that slams down upon your foes with the force of a lawmaker's decree. The very air shifts as it descends, delivering both physical force and the weight of authority to any creature caught in its path. Those struck by the gavel not only feel the impact on their bodies but are also momentarily stunned by the overwhelming conviction of your will.
components: V, S, M (a small wooden mallet)

name: Objection: Sustained
longDescription: With a sharp declaration, you unleash a wave of forceful energy that manifests as a barrier of shimmering light. This barrier not only deflects incoming attacks but also serves as a moral stand against unjust actions within a radius. Any creature attempting to successfully commit an act of treachery or deceit within the barrier's area must contend with the powerful backlash of the truth aching to surface.
components: V, S, M (a silver coin worth at least 1 gold piece)

name: Summon Bailiff
longDescription: With an incantation that echoes through the courts of justice, you summon a spectral bailiff, clad in ethereal robes, who aids you in maintaining order and discipline. The bailiff manifests in an adjacent space, standing ready to enforce the law and protect the innocent, offering guidance and control over the battlefield. This spectral figure can enforce the rules of combat, providing assistance wherever necessary.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of parchment and a quill)

name: Supreme Ruling
longDescription: With this spell, you assert your dominance over the battlefield, compelling creatures to follow your commands. You channel the essence of leadership and control, projecting an aura of unassailable authority that forces obedience from those within its influence.
components: V, S, M (a crown or scepter)

name: Chrono-Stutter
longDescription: You ripple the temporal flow around a single creature, causing their perception of time to fragment and their movements to become disjointed. Their actions feel like wading through thick syrup, or their limbs simply refuse to obey their will in the correct sequence. This makes it difficult for them to coordinate complex actions or move with any speed.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of powdered quicksilver)

name: Gravitic Flux
longDescription: You weave the very fabric of space-time, creating a localized field of intense gravitational instability. When you cast this spell, choose one of two effects: 1. **Imminent Collapse:** All creatures within the sphere must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pulled 20 feet towards the center of the sphere and have their speed reduced to 0 until the start of your next turn. 2. **Violent Repulsion:** All creatures within the sphere must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 20 feet away from the center of the sphere and fall prone. While concentrating on this spell, as a bonus action on subsequent turns, you can choose one of the two effects again, applying it to all creatures currently within the sphere.
components: V, S, M (a small, polished lodestone, which the spell consumes)

name: Supreme Ruling
longDescription: As you invoke the power of justice, a massive courtroom materializes around you, filled with an ethereal judge and baleful jury. Each creature within the area must state its case for its actions—it could be a manner of defense, an explanation, or an excuse. Should any creature fail to persuade the decider, they are swiftly whisked away to the chaotic realm of Limbo, where they remain in a state of uncertainty until freed by a greater power or the will of fate itself.
components: V, S, M (a gavel worth at least 50 gp)

name: Fireball
longDescription: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)

name: Faint Wind
longDescription: You release a gentle breeze from your body that carries with it subtle magical energy. This faint wind can extinguish small flames, disperse light gases or vapors, carry scents up to 30 feet away, or provide minor relief from heat. The wind is barely perceptible but can be directed with precision to perform delicate tasks like turning book pages, rustling curtains, or creating small dust devils.
components: S, M (a feather or small piece of cloth)

name: Healing Word
longDescription: You speak a word of power that can instantly mend wounds and restore vitality. A warm, golden light briefly surrounds the target as their injuries knit together and their strength returns.
components: V

name: Phantasmal Rebuke
longDescription: You weave a potent illusion around yourself, causing your form to shimmer with an ethereal, disorienting haze. Any creature that successfully strikes you with an attack is immediately assailed by a powerful mental illusion, convincing them their own blow has rebounded upon themselves. Their mind creates a vivid, painful perception of their attack striking them with full force, often leading to a moment of panicked self-preservation and confusion.
components: V, S, M (a flawless polished mirror shard and a drop of quicksilver, both consumed)

name: Eng Grasp
longDescription: You gesture towards the ground, and a tangle of thick, thorny vines erupts with astonishing speed, coiling around creatures within the targeted area. Those caught are pierced by razor-sharp thorns and held fast, struggling against the relentless embrace of the sentient flora.
components: V, S, M (a thorny branch)

name: Silver Sentence
longDescription: A halo of radiant silver chains descends from above, attempting to bind a creature you can see. The target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it is restrained for the duration. While restrained, it glows with a faint silvery light, marking it as judged. At the end of each of its turns, the target may repeat the save to break free. The chains also emit a soft hum, audible within 30 feet, which can provide a slight distraction to nearby creatures.
components: V, S, M (a silver thread)

name: Moontrace
longDescription: By invoking the power of the moon, you mark a creature within your sight, imbuing it with a celestial glow. For the duration of the spell, this mark enhances your attacks and your ability to track the target. Each time you strike the marked creature with a weapon attack, radiant energy from the moon enhances the blow, dealing an additional 1d6 radiant damage. Furthermore, the lunar connection grants you heightened senses, providing advantage on Perception and Survival checks to track or locate the target.
components: V

name: Starlight Impact
longDescription: You channel Selua’s divine power to infuse your arcane rifle with radiant energy. For the duration, each ranged weapon attack you make with the rifle deals an additional 1d8 radiant damage. When you attack from a hidden or unseen position, your attacks deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage (for a total of 2d8) and do not break your stealth if the target dies as a result. The rifle’s bullets remain physical projectiles, but each is bathed in shimmering starlight, humming softly with divine energy as you load and fire.
components: V, S

name: Misty Step
longDescription: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see. The mist provides a brief visual cover, making your departure and arrival slightly obscured.
components: V

name: Cosmic Veil
longDescription: A shimmering cosmic cloak of starlight wraps around the target, granting them invisibility when standing in darkness or moonlight. The veil appears as a faint outline of constellations that shift and dance around the creature's form. The spell ends immediately if the target steps into bright light, attacks, or casts a spell. While invisible, the target moves with ethereal grace, leaving no footprints and making no sound from movement.
components: V, S, M (a piece of obsidian and silver dust worth 25 gp)

name: Starfall
longDescription: You call upon the celestial heavens to rain down countless tiny motes of brilliant starlight in a wide area. These luminous fragments cascade from above like a meteor shower, each mote bursting with radiant energy upon impact. The divine light not only sears creatures with celestial fire but also pierces through magical deceptions, revealing hidden foes and forcing shape-shifted beings back to their true forms as the pure starlight disrupts their transformative magic.
components: V, S, M (a fragment of meteorite worth 50 gp)

name: Moonbeam
longDescription: A silvery beam of pale light shines down in a 5-foot radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it is engulfed in ghostly flames that cause searing pain and must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes 2d10 radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. A shapechanger makes its saving throw with disadvantage. If it fails, it also instantly reverts to its original form and can't assume a different form until it leaves the spell's light. On each of your turns after you cast this spell, you can use an action to move the beam up to 60 feet in any direction.
components: V, S, M (several seeds of any moonseed plant and a piece of opalescent feldspar)

name: Dream
longDescription: This spell shapes a creature's dreams. You, or a willing creature you touch, enters a trance state and acts as a messenger that appears in the target's dream. The messenger remains aware of its surroundings but is incapacitated and loses all senses except hearing and sight. The target must be on the same plane of existence as you. You, or the touched creature, appear in the target's dreams and can converse with the target as long as it remains asleep, through the duration of the spell. The messenger can also deliver a message of no more than ten words, and the target recalls it perfectly upon waking. You can make the messenger appear monstrous and frightening to the target. If you do, the messenger can deliver a message of no more than ten words and then the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, echoes of the phantasmal monstrosity spawn a nightmare that lasts the duration of the target's rest and prevents the target from gaining any benefit from that rest. In addition, when the target wakes up, it takes 3d6 psychic damage.
components: V, S, M (a handful of sand, a dab of ink, and a writing quill plucked from a sleeping bird)

name: T-Rex Breath
longDescription: You unleash a noxious cloud reminiscent of the ferocious breath of a prehistoric beast, enveloping your enemies in a stench so potent it burns through the air. The acrid fumes corrode armor and flesh alike, leaving all nearby reeling from its toxic impact.
components: V, S, M (a small piece of sulfur and a drop of acid)

name: Verdant Embrace
longDescription: You cause lush, thorny vines and grasping roots to erupt from the ground or nearby surfaces, filling a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range. The area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. Any hostile creature that starts its turn in the area or enters it for the first time on a turn must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is restrained by the grasping foliage. A creature restrained by the spell can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself. While you maintain concentration on this spell, at the start of your turn, you can choose up to two friendly creatures within the spell's area. Each chosen creature regains 1d6 hit points.
components: V, S, M (a fresh sprig of ivy and a drop of purified water)

name: Weightless Ascent
longDescription: You select one creature or object within range, causing its density to become negligible. The target's weight is reduced to near zero, allowing it to float gently upwards at a rate of 10 feet per round if unrestrained, or be lifted and moved with exceptional ease. A creature affected by this spell gains advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks made to balance or move silently, and its jump distance is tripled. If cast on an unwilling creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or begin to float. The spell can lift an object weighing up to 500 pounds.
components: V, S, M (a tiny silver wire coiled around a feather)

name: Fireball
longDescription: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. The fire expands in an instant, engulfing creatures and objects in the area. The spell's fiery burst can melt metals and ignite flammable materials.
components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)

name: Cure Wounds
longDescription: You touch a creature and channel positive energy into it, mending its wounds. A soft glow emanates from your hand as the injuries of the creature begin to close and heal.
components: V, S

name: Phantasmal Maelstrom
longDescription: You weave strands of pure illusion into a swirling vortex that erupts from a point you choose within range. Creatures caught within perceive a terrifying, disorienting hallucination, losing track of their surroundings and even themselves. Sounds become distorted, familiar sights twist into nightmares, and their sense of direction vanishes. The ground itself might seem to shift and buckle beneath them, instilling panic and confusion.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of powdered dreamlily)

name: Verdant Snare
longDescription: You conjure forth a dense, swirling mass of thorny, emerald-green vines that erupt from the ground in a chosen area. The briars lash out, entangling creatures and inflicting painful, shallow wounds. The ground within the area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. The snare persists, constantly shifting and tightening, making movement perilous and threatening to re-snare those who try to move within it.
components: V, S, M (a thorn from a thorny vine)

name: Entangle
longDescription: With a whisper to the forest, you cause thick, grasping vines to burst from the ground in a designated area. These vines attempt to entangle any creatures within, restricting their movement and potentially holding them in place.
components: V, S

name: Thornbind Grasp
longDescription: You conjure a burst of thick, thorny vines from the ground, lashing out to ensnare and constrict creatures within an area. The jagged thorns prick and tear at their victims, holding them fast and inflicting continuous pain. The ground within the area becomes difficult terrain for the duration.
components: V, S, M (a thorny twig)

name: Fractured Resolve
longDescription: You weave a subtle, psychic illusion that preys upon the minds of your enemies, sowing seeds of uncertainty and fear. Targets perceive their allies as potential threats and their own capabilities as diminished, causing them to falter and hesitate in battle. Their confidence crumbles, making them vulnerable to your allies' assaults.
components: V, S, M (a shard of cracked obsidian, consumed)

name: Crystalline Aegis
longDescription: You conjure a shimmering, translucent barrier of pure magical force around a willing creature or object you can see within range. The barrier glows with a faint, protective light and automatically absorbs up to 50 points of damage from any source before dissipating. While active, any creature that successfully hits the shielded target with a melee attack triggers a retaliatory pulse, taking force damage as the aegis lashes out.
components: V, S, M (a piece of clear quartz crystal, which is consumed)

name: Invisibility
longDescription: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends if the subject attacks or casts a spell.
components: V, S, M (an eyelash encased in gum arabic)

name: Fireball
longDescription: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. The fire expands in an instant, damaging all creatures within its area.
components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)

name: Hunter's Mark
longDescription: You choose a creature you can see within range and mystically mark it as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra damage to the target whenever you hit it with a weapon attack, and you have advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check you make to find it. If the target drops to 0 hit points before this spell ends, you can use a bonus action on a subsequent turn of yours to mark a new creature.
components: V

name: Magic Missile
longDescription: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.
components: V, S

name: Mage Armor
longDescription: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell doesn't affect creatures wearing armor or natural armor.
components: V, S, M (a piece of cured leather)

name: Arcane Greatsword
longDescription: You summon a spectral greatsword made of pure magical energy that you can wield or command to attack enemies. The sword glows with a faint, otherworldly light, and its strikes resonate with arcane power.
components: V, S

name: Spectral Handaxe
longDescription: You conjure a spectral handaxe made of pure force energy. With a swift gesture, you can send this weapon flying towards your target, where it strikes with unerring accuracy before dissipating.
components: V, S

name: Spectral Dagger
longDescription: You conjure a spectral dagger that materializes in your hand. With a swift motion, you throw it at a target, where it phases through armor to strike directly at the essence of your foe. Upon hitting, the dagger dissipates, leaving a chilling mark.
components: V, S

name: Arcane Longbow
longDescription: You channel magical energy to create a spectral longbow that you can wield. With each arrow, you fire a bolt of pure arcane energy, which can pierce through the defenses of your foes with unerring accuracy.
components: V, S, M (a piece of sinew or string)

name: Arcane Shortbow
longDescription: You infuse a shortbow with arcane energy, allowing it to fire arrows imbued with magical force. Upon activation, the next arrow shot from this bow seeks out its target with unerring accuracy and explodes on impact, releasing a burst of magical energy.
components: V, S, M (a shortbow and a pinch of powdered silver)

name: Leather Armor Enchantment
longDescription: You weave a subtle enchantment into a piece of leather armor, enhancing its protective qualities with magical resilience. The armor becomes lighter, more flexible, and grants the wearer an additional layer of magical defense against physical attacks.
components: V, S, M (a piece of leather and a drop of oil)

name: Acid Splash
longDescription: You hurl a bubble of acid at one or two creatures you can see within range. The acid splashes in a small area upon impact, potentially affecting multiple targets. Upon hitting, the bubble bursts, covering the targets in corrosive acid that eats away at their flesh or armor.
components: V, S

name: Alarm
longDescription: You set an invisible magical ward on an area that alerts you if a creature of Tiny size or larger enters the warded area without speaking the password you specify when casting the spell. The ward lasts for the duration or until it is triggered or dismissed. When triggered, you hear a mental ping that awakens you if you are sleeping.
components: V, S, M (a tiny bell and a piece of fine silver wire)

name: Animal Friendship
longDescription: With soothing words and gentle gestures, you attempt to befriend an animal and turn it into an ally. The creature must see and hear you, and if it is not hostile, it becomes charmed by you for the duration. While charmed, the animal regards you as a friendly acquaintance and will not attack you. You can command it to perform simple tasks that a domesticated animal of its kind could do, like fetching items or guiding you through familiar terrain.
components: V, S, M (a morsel of food)

name: Bane
longDescription: You weave a subtle enchantment that saps the confidence and fighting spirit from your enemies. As you cast this spell, a dark whisper fills the air, causing those affected to feel less capable in their endeavors. Each affected creature must make a Wisdom saving throw or suffer a penalty to their attack rolls and saving throws.
components: V, S, M (a drop of blood)

name: Blade Ward
longDescription: You extend your hand and trace an eldritch rune in the air, enveloping yourself in a protective aura that momentarily hardens your skin against slashing and piercing attacks. This magical ward dulls the edge of weapons, reducing their effectiveness against you.
components: V, S

name: Bless
longDescription: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw. This divine favor fills the recipients with a sense of holy purpose, enhancing their resolve and accuracy in combat.
components: V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy water)

name: Burning Hands
longDescription: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
components: V, S

name: Charm Person
longDescription: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range. It must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration. If you or your companions are fighting it, it has advantage on the saving throw. While charmed, the creature regards you as a friendly acquaintance. When the spell ends, the creature knows it was charmed by you.
components: V, S

name: Chill Touch
longDescription: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. The hand reaches out to touch the creature, draining it of warmth and vitality. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you until the end of your next turn. Additionally, the target takes cold damage and can't regain hit points until the spell ends.
components: V, S

name: Chromatic Orb
longDescription: You hurl a 4-inch-diameter sphere of energy at a creature that you can see within range. You choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder for the type of orb you create, and then make a ranged spell attack against the target. If you hit, the orb deals damage of the chosen type to the target.
components: V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 50 gp)

name: Color Spray
longDescription: Upon casting this spell, you emit a dazzling array of vibrant colors from your hand in a cone. These colors blind and confuse creatures, overwhelming their senses and potentially rendering them unconscious.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of powdered prism)

name: Command
longDescription: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The command must be a single word, such as 'Approach', 'Drop', 'Flee', 'Grovel', or 'Halt'. If the command is directly harmful to the creature, it has advantage on the saving throw. If the target can't follow the command, the spell ends.
components: V

name: Compelled Duel
longDescription: You attempt to compel a creature to engage in a one-on-one duel with you, focusing its attention solely on you. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be compelled to engage you in combat to the exclusion of all others. While under the effect, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against any creature other than you, and it cannot willingly move more than 30 feet away from you.
components: V, S

name: Comprehend Languages
longDescription: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear. You also understand any written language that you see, but you must touch the surface on which the words are written. It takes about 1 minute to read one page of text. This spell doesn’t decode secret messages in a text or a glyph, such as an arcane sigil, that isn’t part of a written language.
components: V, S, M (a pinch of soot and salt)

name: Create or Destroy Water
longDescription: You either create up to 10 gallons of clean water within range or destroy an equal volume of water that you can see. When creating water, it can appear in an open container or as rain in a 30-foot cube within range, falling over 1 round. When destroying water, you can evaporate water from a container or natural source, or cause existing water to disappear.
components: V, S, M (a drop of water if creating or a pinch of dust if destroying)

name: Cure Wounds
longDescription: With a gentle touch, you channel positive energy into a creature, knitting wounds and restoring vitality. Your hands glow with a soft, healing light as you mend the injuries of the target.
components: V, S

name: Dancing Lights
longDescription: You create up to four lights within range that resemble torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs. These lights can move as you direct them, illuminating areas or creating simple shapes. They can hover in the air or move up to 60 feet per round on your turn.
components: V, S, M (a bit of phosphorus or wychwood, or a glowworm)

name: Detect Evil and Good
longDescription: For the duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located. Similarly, you know if there is a place or object within 30 feet of you that has been magically consecrated or desecrated. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.
components: V, S

name: Detect Magic
longDescription: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any.
components: V, S

name: Detect Poison and Disease
longDescription: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you. You also identify the kind of poison, poisonous creature, or disease in each case. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.
components: V, S, M (a yew leaf)

name: Disguise Self
longDescription: You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends or until you use your action to dismiss it. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between. You can't change your body type, so you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you. The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing or would feel your head and hair. If you use this spell to appear thinner than you are, the hand of someone who reaches out to touch you would bump into you while it was seemingly still in midair.
components: V, S

name: Divine Favor
longDescription: You call upon your deity to imbue you with divine power, enhancing your combat abilities with radiant energy. For the duration, your weapon attacks deal additional radiant damage, signifying the favor of your god.
components: V, S

name: Dissonant Whispers
longDescription: You whisper a discordant melody that only one creature of your choice within range can hear, filling it with dread and causing it to become frightened. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it takes psychic damage and must use its reaction, if available, to move away from you as far as its speed allows. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and does not need to move.
components: V

name: Druidcraft
longDescription: You whisper to the spirits of nature to create one of several minor effects within range. You can choose to create a tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours, make a flower blossom, cause a puff of wind, or snuff out a small campfire. This spell reflects the subtle manipulation of natural forces.
components: V, S

name: Eldritch Blast
longDescription: You fire a beam of crackling energy from your hand, which seeks out your foes with unerring precision. The beam splits into multiple blasts as it travels, each one targeting a separate enemy within range.
components: V, S

name: Ensnaring Strike
longDescription: As you cast this spell, you infuse your weapon with magical energy that causes vines to sprout from the ground to entangle your target. When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, thorny vines magically appear at the point of impact, attempting to bind the target.
components: V, S

name: Entangle
longDescription: You cause thick, grasping roots and vines to burst from the ground, attempting to ensnare any creature within the area.
